Class ApacheUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.github.jvirtualhosts.tool.ApacheUtils

public class ApacheUtils
extends Object

Apache Util class. This class intends to be a helper collection dealing with apache configuration ops.

Author:
Mario Mueller

getShell

public ShellCommandExecutor getShell()
Returns the shell which the util class works with. Call getLastOutput() on it to receive the output of the last command that has been executed.

Enables an existing, saved virtual host.

Parameters:
pathToAvailableSites -
pathToEnabledSites -
filename -
Returns:
true on success, false on failure. Both events are reported back from the corresponding file or shell utils.
